name: Neris
description:
Derived from the word Siren, Neris is a community-based scalable rhythm game.

It's essentially an 8K rhythm game, which means it has eight channels, but based on Neris' dual-system structure (the rhythm judgment structure is separated from the animation structure), you can create a lot of games, from 1K to 8K, from dropping, appearing, fixed keys to full-screen points, and so on – as long as you can write them in godot 4.

If you're confident enough, you can even write any rhythm game — as long as you follow the right format, and Godot 4 can do it. Once compiled to PCK, you can add the API by uploading to the web (CatBox is recommended) and then notifying me to add the link to the API - of course, the copyright belongs to you, and you can do anything with your own game, as long as you comply with the license.

If you are interested in cooperating, please send an email to bosegluon@outlook.com

Temporary Forum for Neris https://neris.666forum.com/
